医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
SolasCure 在领先的伤口护理杂志上发表 IIa 期临床试验报告研究证明了 Aurase 伤口凝胶对慢性伤口患者的概念验证和强大的安全性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/SolasCure-publishes-phase-IIa-clinical-trial-report-in-leading-wound-care-journal.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/SolasCure-publishes-phase-IIa-clinical-trial-report-in-leading-wound-care-journal.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aa89025d-e01b-4ce7-a07b-0c3144d2043b Mon, 04 Mar 2024 04:35:00 -0500 SolasCure publishes phase IIa clinical trial report in leading wound care journal
新的 scSNV-seq 技术揭示了癌症和阿尔茨海默病等疾病的遗传驱动因素科学家们开发了一种新的筛查工具，以揭示遗传变化如何影响基因活性并可能导致癌症、自身免疫、神经退行性疾病和心血管疾病等疾病。这一新工具能够在一次实验中调查基因研究发现的数千种 DNA 突变，从而指导先进诊断和治疗的开发。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/New-scSNV-seq-technique-unveils-genic-drivers-of-diseases-like-cancer-and-Alzheimers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/New-scSNV-seq-technique-unveils-genic-drivers-of-diseases-like-cancer-and-Alzheimers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b7adfd46-8217-4999-b52d-19756aed681c Mon, 04 Mar 2024 04:31:00 -0500 New scSNV-seq technique unveils genetic drivers of diseases like cancer and Alzheimer's
突破性免疫疗法针对非癌细胞以防止乳腺癌扩散根据 Breast Cancer Now 资助的新研究，一种针对非癌细胞的新型免疫疗法可以帮助预防乳腺癌肿瘤的生长和扩散。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/Breakthrough-immunotherapy-targets-non-cancer-cells-to-prevent-breast-cancer-spread.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/Breakthrough-immunotherapy-targets-non-cancer-cells-to-prevent-breast-cancer-spread.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=829b8e9f-96eb-4ddd-9fdd-cd68c6816f90 Mon, 04 Mar 2024 04:28:00 -0500 Breakthrough immunotherapy targets non-cancer cells to prevent breast cancer spread
国际空间站的新调查扩展了用于学生航天实验的太空工具包中的基因近十年来，Genes in Space™ 一直要求学生开发利用生物技术解决航天挑战的航天实验。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/New-ISS-investigation-expands-genes-in-space-toolkit-for-student-spaceflight-experiments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/New-ISS-investigation-expands-genes-in-space-toolkit-for-student-spaceflight-experiments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f604845e-7db6-495f-9201-84f8dc81c2b3 Mon, 04 Mar 2024 04:25:00 -0500 New ISS investigation expands genes in space toolkit for student spaceflight experiments
良好的振动可以为患有社交焦虑症的人提供帮助新研究表明，患有社交焦虑症的人可以通过良好振动的力量来缓解压力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/Good-vibrations-could-provide-a-helping-hand-to-people-living-with-social-anxiety.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/Good-vibrations-could-provide-a-helping-hand-to-people-living-with-social-anxiety.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dbfdf03c-f0ba-4228-8d75-3ebe3e9c1379 Mon, 04 Mar 2024 04:13:00 -0500 Good vibrations could provide a helping hand to people living with social anxiety
Clinigen 推出“什么是可能的？”扩大罕见病治疗机会的运动全球制药服务公司 Clinigen 今天发起了一项名为“什么是可能的？”的新活动帮助患者和医疗专业人员了解罕见疾病治疗中还有哪些可能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/Clinigen-launches-What-is-Possible-campaign-to-expand-access-to-rare-disease-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/Clinigen-launches-What-is-Possible-campaign-to-expand-access-to-rare-disease-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=98f5af72-2d59-4eb5-bfee-61fd3e6619fa Mon, 04 Mar 2024 04:09:00 -0500 Clinigen launches 'What is Possible?' campaign to expand access to rare disease treatments
英国 iiCON 发起新倡议，资助应对感染传播的创新解决方案拥有解决感染传播新解决方案的公司和研究小组将有机会塑造英国感染应对的方向，并通过刺激创新的新举措争取资金。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/UKs-iiCON-leads-new-initiative-to-fund-innovative-solutions-for-tackling-infection-transmission.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/UKs-iiCON-leads-new-initiative-to-fund-innovative-solutions-for-tackling-infection-transmission.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=26e0d341-4b3b-4832-b3ca-edebc3f089c1 Mon, 04 Mar 2024 04:06:00 -0500 UK's iiCON leads new initiative to fund innovative solutions for tackling infection transmission
PharmaKure 与谢菲尔德哈勒姆大学合作开发用于阿尔茨海默病预测的表观遗传标记PharmaKure 是一家临床阶段制药公司，致力于开发治​​疗阿尔茨海默病 (AD) 和其他神经退行性疾病的精准药物，今天宣布与谢菲尔德哈勒姆大学开展新的表观遗传学合作。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/PharmaKure-partners-with-Sheffield-Hallam-University-to-develop-epigenic-markers-for-Alzheimere28099s-disease-prediction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/PharmaKure-partners-with-Sheffield-Hallam-University-to-develop-epigenic-markers-for-Alzheimere28099s-disease-prediction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=644a8374-02a4-49a9-b42e-637bd98ce43b Mon, 04 Mar 2024 04:01:00 -0500 PharmaKure partners with Sheffield Hallam University to develop epigenetic markers for Alzheimer’s disease prediction
藜麦生物活性化合物对肠道健康的影响研究人员回顾了藜麦及其生物活性化合物的有益影响，特别是其对肠道微生物群的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/The-impact-of-quinoa-bioactive-compounds-on-gut-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/The-impact-of-quinoa-bioactive-compounds-on-gut-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c4d288ea-ab72-452c-ba35-2003a71e8ad4 Mon, 04 Mar 2024 03:59:00 -0500 The impact of quinoa bioactive compounds on gut health
天气灾害增加了医疗保险受益人的急诊就诊率和死亡率麻省总医院布里格姆分校的研究表明，在重大气候驱动的极端天气事件发生几周后，急诊就诊和死亡人数会增加，这凸显了这些事件可能对健康和基础设施产生的长期影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/Weather-disasters-increase-emergency-department-visits-and-mortality-among-Medicare-beneficiaries.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/Weather-disasters-increase-emergency-department-visits-and-mortality-among-Medicare-beneficiaries.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5d72bd67-11a8-4e41-80f8-5e965ec9fd63 Mon, 04 Mar 2024 03:56:00 -0500 Weather disasters increase emergency department visits and mortality among Medicare beneficiaries
